import React from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom/client';import r2wc from'react-to-webcomponent';import CampaignPacingCalculator from'./CampaignPacingCalculator';// Define <r2wc-pacing-calculator> as a web component, no shadow DOM, config prop parses JSON
const WebComponent=r2wc(CampaignPacingCalculator,React,ReactDOM,{shadow:false,props:{config:'json'}});if(!customElements.get('r2wc-pacing-calculator')){customElements.define('r2wc-pacing-calculator',WebComponent);}// No mount — this bundle is for embedding only.
